content: > for help and community join our free > fb group 1 **the linked cowl** **difficulty** beginner **materials** drops alaska 100% wool 50g 70m 2 skeins color 55 or any #4 weight yarn hook 6mm yarn needle scissors measuring tape **sizes** this sample is 5 wide x 30 long to make this cowl longer add chains in even # **stitch key** chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet yo = yarn over **notes** this pattern is worked in row chain 1 at the beginning of the round does not count as a stitch stay calm and crochet sandra 1 https //www facebook com/groups/1485811495102299
